meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jessica Guard Bruce Leaman Sandie Baker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6814.

td.p: Jessica Guard, an entertainment litigation attorney from New York, New York
Bruce Leaman, a justice of the peace from Thunder Bay, Ontario, Canada
Sandie Baker, a translation coordinator from Eastpointe, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,400)

tr.td: PENNY FOR YOUR THOUGHTS
TV ADJECTIVES
SPOT THE MATH TERM
AN ECO-CATEGORY
THE 5 FAMILIES
"D.C." POWER

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: World leader who was very much in the news just a few months ago, unfortunately.)
...
(Alex: [To Sandie] And I can read the first line. And it looks like you were trying to clean up your writing by writing it a second time. You didn\'t need to do that.)
(Sandie: Oh, okay.)
BruceWho was Nelson Mandela?
$8,000
JessicaWho is Nelson Mandela?
$5,001
SandieWho is Mandela? Mandel
$8,500
Nelson Mandela')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1964 he was convicted of sabotage & conspiracy & served over 20 years in prison')

tr.td: FOREIGN LEADERS
In 1964 he was convicted of sabotage & conspiracy & served over 20 years in prison
Sandie
Bruce
Jessica
2-day champion: $44,900
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Sandie
Bruce
Jessica

1 W
(including 1 DD)
